product_overview: Vitan Task Management is a comprehensive full-stack application designed for efficient task, project, and team management with integrated WhatsApp communication and robust analytics. It offers seamless user experiences across web interfaces with multi-language support, real-time validations, and accessibility compliance.
core_goals: Enable users to efficiently create, update, and manage tasks with rich features like status tracking, comments, and assignments.
Provide project and team management features including team invitations, role assignments, and template-based quick project/task creation.
Integrate WhatsApp messaging and notification features for enhanced communication and OTP-based authentication.
Deliver comprehensive analytics dashboards with various key metrics and data visualizations to assist in performance tracking.
Ensure responsive, accessible, and user-friendly interfaces with multi-language form validation, and smooth navigation using modern React-based frontend technologies.
Establish secure and performant backend APIs with proper authentication, error handling, and external service integrations.
key_features: Authentication System supporting WhatsApp and email with OTP verification for secure user access.
Complete Task Management System with CRUD operations, status updates, comments, and assignments.
Project Management including creation, team assignment, and template support for rapid project setup.
Team Management capabilities for user invitations, role management, and member administration.
Analytics Dashboard offering visualization and key performance metrics for tasks, projects, and users.
WhatsApp Integration for sending and receiving messages, notifications, and OTP verification.
Template System for efficient task and project creation using reusable templates.
Reusable UI Component Library built with shadcn/ui ensuring consistency and accessibility.
Client-side Form Validation with support for multiple languages, real-time feedback, and input normalization.
Robust RESTful API Integration with comprehensive error handling and retry logic.
React Router based Routing System with protected and deep-linked routes.
React Hooks and Context based State Management with local storage support.
Accessibility features including ARIA roles, labels, keyboard navigation, and screen-reader support.
Mobile-first Responsive Design implemented with Tailwind CSS for optimal cross-device experience.
Comprehensive Error Handling providing user feedback via alerts and toast notifications.
user_flow_summary: User authentication via email or WhatsApp number with OTP verification ensuring secure login.
Task creation flow involving input validation, assignment, status setting, and optional comment additions.
Project setup combining project creation, team member assignment, and template usage for efficiency.
Team management workflows for inviting users, assigning roles, and editing member details.
Navigation between dashboard, task lists, analytics, projects, team, and templates using React Router with state persistence.
Interaction with WhatsApp integration for sending messages, receiving notifications, and verifying users.
Use of analytics dashboard for viewing key metrics and breakdown visualizations to monitor productivity.
Form interactions with real-time, multi-language validation feedback and proper error handling before submission.
validation_criteria: Authentication workflows execute successfully with valid OTPs and proper error messaging on failures.
Task CRUD operations complete consistently with data validation, correct status updates, and UI reflects changes promptly.
Project and team management workflows handle user invitations, role changes, and permission enforcement without errors.
WhatsApp messaging and notification features send, receive, and track messages accurately, including webhook event processing.
Templates for tasks and projects can be created, edited, and applied effectively for quick workflow setups.
UI components render correctly without React warnings, and accessibility features (ARIA, keyboard navigation) function properly.
All form fields validate input according to multi-language support, phone format, and required field checks with real-time feedback.
Routing transitions occur smoothly with protected route enforcement and deep linking supported.
Analytics data presented is accurate, up-to-date, and visually clear across charts and key metric components.
Backend APIs respond properly with correct HTTP codes for success and errors and handle edge cases gracefully.
Frontend and backend communications handle failures with user-friendly error messages and retry logic.
Application UI is fully responsive across device sizes and meets accessibility compliance as verified in accessibility reports.
